title: Will there be more of K/DA music?
body: I'm just obsessed with the song {{sticker:sg-kiko}} and hope it's not just one video to promote the skins.{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: Most likely just one video for the skins right now since, that's all that was released. I'd expect more if they were to do more in the future.

I hope so. It's really neat having a group compiled of some really awesome League champs. Hopefully we can get a boy band too! Or even just a bad@$$ male singer! 

The song gets me pumped up and I hope if they do make more, they are still relevant to League.
look up pentakill, its leagues original band. has mordekaiser, yorick, karthus, olaf, sona, and kayle.
Can't you just listen to other pop music? It's all very similar.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ApJHMjE8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-04T11:45:03.577+0000)
>
> Can't you just listen to other pop music? It's all very similar.

I used to think like you, then I put down the edge.
